page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT: PLAYHOUSE
page.content: {Potton Playhouse}started eight years ago. They meet in the hall of the {United Reform Church}when they want to present a play. The first pantomime performed was called{Aladdin}and the second was{The Wild West Show}when the audience had to sit at tables and eat sausages and mashed potato, as though they were in a saloon bar. Every year they have a pantomime, just after Christmas, for the whole family to go and watch, and in summer they present plays for adults and a childrens' Summer Show. Sometimes one of the members writes the script and everyone is busy with the scenery, lights, costume, make-up and learning lines for plays. Some of the pantomimes they have done are{Cinderella, Aladdin, The {Wizard of Oz, Snow White}and{Sleeping {Beauty.
